# Inline demos
Normal Text, `This is inline code`, *This is single emphasis*,
**This is double emphasis**, ***This is triple emphasis***.

# Block demos

```
This is a plain code block

```

```python
print("This is a python code block")
a = more + than - one * line / here % 42
```
